title: Firecrackers & Humidor Giveaway
itunes:title: Firecrackers & Humidor Giveaway
description:
Join us this week as we light up the SOLD OUT RoMaCraft Firecracker on The Cigar Authority. Will David Garofalo & Mr. Jonathan be able to make it through this explosive cigar or will they tap out? Tune in to find out how you can win a 5-pack!

In the second hour Nick Perdomo from Perdomo Cigars makes it on the show as we reveal the winner of the $5,000 Perdomo Humidor Giveaway!

Join us and light up for the madness know as The Cigar Authority.
